alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 9:50AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Heart River near Mandan affecting Morton County in North Dakota... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Heart River near Mandan. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 27.2 feet. - Forecast...Minor flooding is forecast to continue. According to local officials, the ice jam has moved downstream a bit. This may result in lower river readings right at the river gauge, but minor flooding continues to occur in the vicinity of the ice jam. Typically, these ice jams can continue to cause flooding for around two to four days. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
